fullText:
Hunter's Resurgence

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, ranger, Hunter’s Quarry class feature
Benefit: When you reduce your quarry to 0 hit points, you can use your second wind as a free action. You do not gain the normal bonus to defenses if you do so.

Published in Martial Power, page(s) 144.
